kv18.7:10.1_0: Immersion without placing the mind, but just keeping it connected?
kv18.7:10.3_0: Immersion with placing the mind and keeping it connected. ...
kv18.7:11.1_0: Immersion without placing the mind, but just keeping it connected?
kv18.7:11.3_0: Immersion without placing the mind and keeping it connected?
kv18.7:12.1_0: Immersion with placing the mind and keeping it connected. ...
kv18.7:12.3_0: Immersion without placing the mind, but just keeping it connected?
kv18.7:13.1_0: Immersion without placing the mind or keeping it connected?
kv18.7:13.3_0: Immersion without placing the mind, but just keeping it connected?
kv18.7:14.1_0: Recollecting absorptions, thoughts of mind, and dependently originated phenomena as they are.
kv18.7:14.3_0: Have the second absorption in an undetermined immersion, having entered the first absorption?
kv18.7:14.5_0: Had aside the first absorption, when the second absorption had ceased and stilled the second absorption, and the third absorption has passed, not ceased.
kv18.7:14.6_0: “The two absorptions have faded away and ceased without placing the mind and keeping it connected. Immersion without placing the mind, but just keeping it connected.”
kv18.7:15.1_0: Immersion without placing the mind, but just keeping it connected?
kv18.7:15.3_0: Immersion without placing the mind, but just keeping it connected. ...
kv18.7:15.8_0: And so there’s just a meditation subject as a foundation of immersion.
kv18.7:16.10_0: The exposition of the section on “men is finished.
kv18.7:16.1_0: Immersion without placing the mind, but just keeping it connected?
kv18.7:16.4_0: immersion without placing the mind and keeping it connected. Immersion without placing the mind, but just keeping it connected. Immersion without placing the mind or keeping it connected?”
kv18.7:16.6_0: Has been spoken by the Buddha:
kv18.7:16.8_0: Immersion without placing the mind, but just keeping it connected. ...
kv18.7:16.9_0: “Stop placing the mind, but just keeping it connected. ...”
kv18.7:2.3_0: There is a second absorption and the third absorption, which is neither absorption nor non-conflict.
kv18.7:3.3_0: And there is the third absorption and the fourth absorptions the dimension of infinite space;
kv18.7:4.1_0: And second absorption and the third absorption there is no stress due to the second absorption
kv18.7:4.3_0: Experts the second absorption and the third absorption on the fourth absorption, he doesn’t proceed when asked.
kv18.7:5.1_0: And with the third absorption and the fourth absorption?”
kv18.7:5.3_0: And the third absorption and the fourth absorption, the fourth absorption is disappearing, and the noble ones don’t fall into the fourth absorption,
kv18.7:6.1_0: And there is a first absorption and the second absorption, which is noble and sound.
kv18.7:6.3_0: There is a second absorption and the third absorption, which is neither absorption nor non-conflict.
kv18.7:7.1_0: And there is a first absorption and the second absorption, which is noble and sound.
kv18.7:7.3_0: And there is the third absorption and the fourth absorptions the dimension of infinite space;
kv18.7:8.1_0: And second absorption and the third absorption there is no stress due to the second absorption
kv18.7:8.3_0: And one with the first absorption and the second absorption: non-conflict.
kv18.7:9.1_0: And with the third absorption and the fourth absorption?”
kv18.7:9.3_0: And one with the first absorption and the second absorption: non-conflict.
